mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_EXAM_INFO (EXAM_NO, PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_NAME, ID_NO, PHONE_NUMBER, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, EXAM_NAME, EXAM_CLASS, EXAM_SUB_CLASS, REQ_PHYSICIAN, DOCTOR_CODE, REQ_DATE_TIME, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_DATE_TIME, REPORTER, REPORT_DATE_TIME, RESULT_STATUS, TOTAL_EXPENSE, RECEIVABLE_EXPENSE, ACTUAL_EXPENSE, CHARGE_INDICATOR, PRESC_NO, EXAM_PARA, PICTURE_STATUS, EXAM_SOURCE, DESCRIPTION, IMPRESSION, RECOMMENDATION) values (#{examNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examSubClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqPhysician,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{examDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivableExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeIndicator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prescNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examPara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{examSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{impression,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{recommendation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update V_HIS_EXAM_INFO set PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATIENT_NAME = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INHOSPITAL_NO = #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTPATIENT_NO = #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_NAME = #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_CLASS = #{examClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_SUB_CLASS = #{examSubClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQ_PHYSICIAN = #{reqPhysician,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_CODE = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQ_DATE_TIME = #{reqDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INS_DEPT_CODE = #{insDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INS_DEPT_NAME = #{insDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_DATE = #{examDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EXAM_DATE_TIME = #{examDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPORTER = #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_DATE_TIME = #{reportDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESULT_STATUS = #{resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_EXPENSE = #{totalExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVABLE_EXPENSE = #{receivableExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTUAL_EXPENSE = #{actualExpense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE_INDICATOR = #{chargeIndicator,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRESC_NO = #{prescNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_PARA = #{examPara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTURE_STATUS = #{pictureStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXAM_SOURCE = #{examSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, IMPRESSION = #{impression,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RECOMMENDATION = #{recommendation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where EXAM_NO = #{examNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EXAM_NO, PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_NAME, ID_NO, PHONE_NUMBER, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, EXAM_NAME, EXAM_CLASS, EXAM_SUB_CLASS, REQ_PHYSICIAN, DOCTOR_CODE, REQ_DATE_TIME, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_DATE_TIME, REPORTER, REPORT_DATE_TIME, RESULT_STATUS, TOTAL_EXPENSE, RECEIVABLE_EXPENSE, ACTUAL_EXPENSE, CHARGE_INDICATOR, PRESC_NO, EXAM_PARA, PICTURE_STATUS, EXAM_SOURCE, DESCRIPTION, IMPRESSION, RECOMMENDATION from V_HIS_EXAM_INFO where EXAM_NO = #{examNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
